did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Harvey Reissig papers, 1969-2010.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes correspondence, grant and consultant files, talks, reprints and slides, photographs and CDs of his research trips.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Professor of Entomology, New York State Experiment Station, Geneva and former director of Cornell's Pesticide Management Education Program (PMEP).

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence, grant and consultant files, talks, reprints and slides, photographs and CDs of his research trips.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York State Agricultural Experiment Station.
New York State College of Agriculture. Department of Entomology.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Harvey Reissig Papers, #22-2-4279 . Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
